roleset.name: make very small
roleset.note: MINIATURIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'miniaturize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from miniaturize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: But in recent years, the market has moved toward less expensive ``mini-component'' sets, miniaturized amplifiers and receivers and software players that could be stacked on top of each other.
example.arg: amplifiers and receivers and software players

example.name: ARG0
example.text: Recent developments in optical science and image processing have miniaturized the components required for confocal microscopy.
example.arg: Recent developments in optical science and image processing
the components required for confocal microscopy.
